body:
What's up guys! 

I have recently changed my name from "canuck_pro"  to what it is now, but I'm not too satisfied with my new name and I was wondering if anyone is willing to use their creative mind, to help me come up with a newer, better name. I honestly thought the "shamrock" part was pretty cool, but now it looks a bit weird with the way I play. Shamrcok doesn't really describe who I am, as a player. I want a name that has to do with something with either of the three categories: 1. Sniping/Archery 2. Pandas/Any type of bear, or 3. Mythology (like a name of a warrior or something) I hope you guys understand my intentions about my name change. By the way, I do understand how I have to wait 30 days to officially change my name again. 


Thanks guys! <3<3

title: Username Ideas anyone?? :^)

replies.body: Well done bud. It basically combines all three categories in one xD

replies.body:
BearNecessities
SunWukong (aka MONKEY KING)
BowAimbot
Apollo (Roman mythology, and one of his symbols is the bow and arrow)
Artemis (Greek mythology, and one of her symbols is the bow and arrow)
RapidFire

Yeah, that's all I have for now :l

replies.body:
Theseusandthepolarbear xD On a more serious note, how about:
Sniping-panda
Shootingbanshee 
Wyvernarchery 
Thesunbear
Themoonbear
Arcticarrows
(im not feeling my creative side today)
Arrowheadpanda 
Bowmanperseus
Longbowpanda
Apollospanda 
Hope this helps, if you're looking for any more, try just a simple Greek or Roman or whatever name from mythology, like Achilles or Perseus or Theseus. It will look cool if I'm in a game and "Zeus" just turns up xD http://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_Greek_mythological_figures
